messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] forts and webs
messages.msgSnippet: ... of ... We did this for one of Lars birthday parties when he was 8 or 9.  The kids had a ball.  We gave them each a skein of yarn (from the thrift store)
messages.messageBody:
> > My boys love forts as well but even better are the spider webs. A skein
of
> > yarn and they turn the house into a giant spider web with them being the
> > spiders of course. They love to catch the dogs. LOL
> > Pam G.
>
> Now, this I would LOVE to see. Too funny!

We did this for one of Lars' birthday parties when he was 8 or 9. The kids
had a ball. We gave them each a skein of yarn (from the thrift store) and
let them go at it in the yard.
Tia

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] forts and webs

> My boys love forts as well but even better are the spider webs. A skein of

brenda
